info.title: Avi SSLProfile Object API
info.description:
##CLI##
```
- configure sslprofile <key>
- show sslprofile <key>
```

##Examples##
- **sslprofile_example**: To create a standard security SSL profile
  ```json
    {u'accepted_ciphers': u'aECDSA:aECDH:kEDH:kRSA', u'accepted_versions': [{u'type': u'SSL_VERSION_TLS1'}, {u'type': u'SSL_VERSION_TLS1'}, {u'type': u'SSL_VERSION_TLS1_1'}, {u'type': u'SSL_VERSION_TLS1_2'}], u'name': u'Standard'}
  ```

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. If unset, the version will be defaulted to 16.4.3. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: SSLProfile object creation
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

compatibility_rating.description: Enum options - SSL_SCORE_NOT_SECURE, SSL_SCORE_VERY_BAD, SSL_SCORE_BAD, SSL_SCORE_AVERAGE, SSL_SCORE_GOOD, SSL_SCORE_EXCELLENT.

performance_rating.description: Enum options - SSL_SCORE_NOT_SECURE, SSL_SCORE_VERY_BAD, SSL_SCORE_BAD, SSL_SCORE_AVERAGE, SSL_SCORE_GOOD, SSL_SCORE_EXCELLENT.

ssl_session_timeout.description: The amount of time before an SSL session expires.

accepted_ciphers.description: Ciphers suites represented as defined by U(http //www.openssl.org/docs/apps/ciphers.html).

prefer_client_cipher_ordering.description: Prefer the SSL cipher ordering presented by the client during the SSL handshake over the one specified in the SSL Profile.

description.description: User defined description for the object.

tags.description: Placeholder for description of property tags of obj type SSLProfile field type str  type object

accepted_versions.description: Set of versions accepted by the server.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant.

cipher_enums.description: Enum options - TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384, TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA384, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA384, TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256, TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384, TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256, TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA256, TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA, TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA, TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA, TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA, TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA, TLS_RSA_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA, TLS_RSA_WITH_RC4_128_SHA.

send_close_notify.description: Send 'close notify' alert message for a clean shutdown of the SSL connection.

dhparam.description: DH Parameters used in SSL. At this time, it is not configurable and is set to 2048 bits.

ssl_rating.description: Placeholder for description of property ssl_rating of obj type SSLProfile field type str  type object

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.
